content.p: The Automated Transcription Service transcribes audio files quickly and for a fraction of the cost of manual transcription. This web-based service offers a secure and compliant approach to transcribing audio data. This service automatically converts MP3 recordings into text. It provides an alternative to more costly manual transcription services and can save you time. The Automated Transcription service offers: The Automated Transcription Service has been introduced with support from the Research Strategy and the Digital Futures Programme. PGRs, post-docs and research staff. Â£0.75 per hour of audio transcribed. For further details, please see here. For more information and access, please see here.
